original_text: If you really want to give, then God will accept your gift. God does not want you to give more than you are able to give. He will be happy about what you can give.
korean_text: 할 마음만 있으면 있는 대로 받으실 터이요 없는 것은 받지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: If you really want to give,
then God will accept your gift.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 하나님은 당신의 선물을 받으실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: God does not want you to give
more than you are able to give.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 줄 수 있는 것보다 더 많이.
당신이 줄 수 있는 것에 대해.
